text: The party asks Durnan about rumors surrounding Undermountain, receiving a cryptic warning.
Frognar has a flashback to his religious upbringing, learning about Moradin and the Forgekeepers.
Frognar leaves the Yawning Portal and heads towards the market district, inviting Kallisar to join him.
Frognar leaves the Yawning Portal and heads towards the market district, inviting Kallisar to join him.
Frognar roleplays as the new party member, Borin Stonehand, expressing interest in Undermountain and adventure.
